This is a script to score the questionnaire data.

Read data in.

```{r}
q.data <- read.csv(pipe('ssh -l zenkavi ls5.tacc.utexas.edu "cat /corral-repl/utexas/poldracklab/users/zenkavi/dev_study/data/behav/questionnaire/DevelopmentalStudy_DATA_2015-03-25_1258.csv"'))

names(q.data)
```

BAS reward responsiveness: bisbas3, bisbas5, bisbas11, bisbas14, bisbas19
BAS drive: bisbas2, bisbas7, bisbas9, bisbas17
BAS fun seeking: bisbas4, bisbas8, bisbas12, bisbas16
